description: A pipeline that reads Striim messages (Json Formatter) from Pub/Sub and writes the results into BigQUery
name: Striim Pub/Sub to BigQuery

parameters.name: outputProject
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery project to write the data to
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Project

parameters.name: outputDataset
parameters.helpText: BigQuery Dataset to write the output to
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Dataset

parameters.name: inputSubscription
parameters.helpText:
The Cloud Pub/Sub subscription to consume from. "
+ "The name should be in the format of "
+ "projects/<project-id>/subscriptions/<subscription-name>.
parameters.label: Source Pub/Sub subscription

parameters.name: schemaReplacer
parameters.helpText: If specified the value will be deleted from destination table. E.g. if 'myschema' is specified and the source table is 'myschema.mytable' the output BigQuery table name will by mytable.
parameters.label: Schema name replacer

parameters.name: metadataField
parameters.helpText: If specified is the field where the Striim metadata will be saved
parameters.label: CDC metadata field
